programme.title: Behind Bars: Women Unchained - Behind Bars: Women Unchained
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 Across the country, the female inmate population is exploding, as more and more women are coming to prison for longer sentences.

programme.title: Kids Behind Bars: Life or Parole - Deon (2021)
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 3 17-year-old Deon Haynes was sentenced to life in prison for killing former classmate Christy Davis in her home.

programme.title: Kids Behind Bars: Life or Parole - Richard (2021)
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 7 Richard Kinder was 17 when he and a friend committed a robbery that ended in a young woman's death, and the serious injury of her boyfriend. Now 65, Richard has served nearly 50 years of a life without parole sentence.

programme.title: Kids Behind Bars: Life or Parole - The Malvo Effect (2021)
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 10 This episode will chronicle the "DC Sniper" murders, and the battle over sentencing one of the most notorious juvenile murderers in American history.

programme.title: Kids Behind Bars: Life or Parole - Justin (2021)
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 5 What drives a teenage boy to kill his own father? Justin Long was only 15 years old when he violently killed his adoptive father, Hoyt Long.

programme.title: Kids Behind Bars: Life or Parole - The Incorrigibles (2021)
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 8 This special offers an in-depth, side by side examination of two explosive cases involving juveniles initially sentenced to life without the possibility of parole.

programme.title: Auckland Beaches: New Zealand - Auckland Beaches: New Zealand
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 2 The relaxing vibe of a day at the beach, with a tour of the breathtaking coastlines near Auckland.

programme.title: Pancake Rocks: New Zealand - Pancake Rocks: New Zealand
programme.desc: Season 1, New Zealand's Pancake Rocks offer a mesmerizing combination of geology, natural beauty, and coastal splendor, with intricate rock patterns and shapes formed over millions of years of wind and water exposure.

programme.title: Broken Beach: Indonesia - Broken Beach: Indonesia
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 Exploring the caves and sea tunnels of a natural pool surrounded by cliffs and stunning views.

programme.title: Earth From Above - Earth From Above
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 3 Traveling the world with a birds-eye-view perspective of scenic wonders.

programme.title: Sunrise Meditation - Sunrise Meditation
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 4 Easimg into the day with the sound of lapping waves and breathtaking beaches from around the world.

programme.title: Falls Colors: Colorado - Falls Colors: Colorado
programme.desc: Season 1, Naturescape offers you an escape to a world of stunning nature scenes, all set to peaceful soundtracks. Relax to a crackling fireplace, soar over a tropical paradise, or get inspired by a sparkling night sky, all from the comfort of home.

programme.title: Haast Falls: New Zealand - Haast Falls: New Zealand
programme.desc: Season 1, Haast Pass, the peak home to these roaring falls of melted glacial waters. Mysteriously misty forests, gorgeous nature trails, and local wildlife.

programme.title: Rainbow Reef Relaxation 2 - Rainbow Reef Relaxation 2
programme.desc: Season 1, Vibrant underwater reefs, including many scenes which no longer look as depicted due to coral bleaching.

programme.title: Redwood National Park: California - Redwood National Park: California
programme.desc: Season 1, Naturescape offers you an escape to a world of stunning nature scenes, all set to peaceful soundtracks. Relax to a crackling fireplace, soar over a tropical paradise, or get inspired by a sparkling night sky, all from the comfort of home.

programme.title: Kapas Biru Waterfall: Indonesia - Kapas Biru Waterfall: Indonesia
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 4 An escape to Indonesia.

programme.title: Redwood Forest Rejuvenation - Redwood Forest Rejuvenation
programme.desc: Season 1, Transporting to the magical redwood forests of Northern California and soaking up the healing energies that only pure nature can provide, with multiple healing scenes from the old-grove forest, paired with real-life stereo nature sounds.

programme.title: Fly Over Paradise: Philippines - Fly Over Paradise: Philippines
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 3 An aerial journey to discover tropical beaches.

programme.title: Fireplace 2, Banff - Fireplace 2, Banff
programme.desc: Season 1, A fireplace, filmed in Banff, Canada, fills viewers' home with warmth and happiness.

programme.title: Naturescape - Naturescape
programme.desc: no info available

programme.title: Forensic Factor - Bloody Valentine
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 9 "My wife's bleeding all over the place," Dr. John Baxter Hamilton tells the 911 operator. "I don't know, she looks like somebody hurt her," but the science suggests a crime of heated rage and cold calculation.

programme.title: Forensic Factor - No Body, No Crime
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 10 Millionaire Frank Black boards a commercial flight and disappears into thin air, never seen or heard from again. Authorities believe Black's former business associate is the man behind the murder.

programme.title: Cops UK: The Bodycam Squad - Episode 5
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 5 A night shift depends into chaos for the cops, one officer is hit with racial abuse, and a member of the public destroys potential evidence.

programme.title: Cops UK: The Bodycam Squad - Episode 6
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 6 A woman has a very bad hair day, a man is talking tough to the cops, and a police dog gets to sink his teeth into suspected, hidden criminals.

programme.title: World’s Most Evil Killers - Stephen Port
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 1 Stephen Port callously killed four young men between 2014 and 2015.

programme.title: World’s Most Evil Killers - Mark Bridger
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 2 In October 2012, Mark Bridger abducted and murdered five-year-old April Jones in Machynlleth, Wales. Evidence found on his laptop led to his conviction.

programme.title: World’s Most Evil Killers - Mick Philpott
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 3 In 2012, fame-hungry Mick Philpott killed six of his own children by setting fire to the family home as they slept upstairs.

programme.title: World’s Most Evil Killers - Raoul Moat
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 4 In 2010, bodybuilder Raoul Moat shot his ex-girlfriend and her partner, and went on the run and declared war on Northumbria police, vowing not to stop killing officers until he was dead.

programme.title: Trace of Evil - Tortured Love
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 317 Tortured Love is the story of a cruel and sadistic crime, a victim who barely survives and how investigators and forensics corroborate her story to bring her merciless attacker to justice.

programme.title: Trace of Evil - Highway Horror
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 318 Highway Horror is the tragic story of Shelby Weatherly, the events leading up to her brutal murder and how determined police work eventually caught her killer.

programme.title: Trace of Evil - The Tantra Rapist
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 319 The Tantra Rapist follows the investigation to catch a serial rapist, his erratic and unpredictable lifestyle and how advanced DNA technology finally tracked him down.

programme.title: Trace of Evil - The Orem Murders
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 320 The Orem Murders is the story of a missing persons incident that turned into a multi-homicide and how intensive and dedicated police work solved the case.

programme.title: Killer Instinct with Chris Hansen - Killer Instinct with Chris Hansen
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 As women go missing and neighbors complain of a bad smell, a Cleveland community becomes the stalking ground of one of America's most brutal serial killers.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Home Soil
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 117 Picard finds himself facing a strenuous test of his loyalty to Starfleet, one which the other members of the crew are struggling to cope with, whilst Wesley faces an equally challenging entrance exam at Starfleet Academy.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - When the Bough Breaks
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 118 A planet that was able to cloak itself for thousands of years suddenly reveals itself, with its inhabitants proposing peace. But, after initial negotiations, children of the Enterprise are kidnapped due to the impotence of the inhabitants.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Coming of Age
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 119 Picard finds himself facing a strenuous test of his loyalty to Starfleet, one which the other members of the crew are struggling to cope with, whilst Wesley faces an equally challenging entrance exam at Starfleet Academy.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Heart of Glory
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 120 The Enterprise encounters a planet long dead, but technical equipment still functions for the purpose of selling off its arsenal, along with self sufficiency.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - The Arsenal of Freedom
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 121 The Enterprise encounters a planet long dead, but technical equipment still functions for the purpose of selling off its arsenal, along with self sufficiency.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Skin of Evil
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 122 While en route back to the Enterprise, the shuttlecraft carrying Counselor Troi loses power and gets caught in a planet's gravity well.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Symbiosis
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 123 The Enterprise encounters two neighboring cultures, one suffering from a plague, the other marketing a cure, and learn that nothing is as simple as it seems.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - We'll Always Have Paris
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 124 The crew of the Enterprise races against time, itself, when a scientist experiments with time, and claims to have opened a window into another dimension, which must be closed.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Conspiracy
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 125 After diverting to a secret meeting with an old friend and some of Starfleet's finest commanders, Picard finds the Horatio blown to bits just hours after the meeting and he returns the Enterprise to Earth looking for answers.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - The Neutral Zone
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 126 "Days of Yesteryear" would be a more appropriate title, as Data finds an old ship in space that's been there for years, with 3 people who've been frozen for over 400 years.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - The Child
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 127 Deanna is impregnated by an unknown alien life-form, and Dr. Katherine Pulaski joins the Enterprise as the ship's new Chief Medical Officer.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Where Silence Has Lease
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 128 The Enterprise encounters a mysterious void in space and when they move in closer to investigate further, it envelops them and they can't get out.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Elementary, Dear Data
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 129 When the Enterprise arrives a few days early at its rendezvous point to meet the USS Victory, the crew have a bit of leisure time on their hands.

programme.title: Flight 7500 - Flight 7500
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 A flight from Los Angeles to Tokyo is rocked by turbulence—and a terrifying force is unleashed in this spine-chilling journey into fear from the director of The Grudge.

programme.title: Arcade - Arcade
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 A virtual reality game becomes sentient and begins killing the teenagers that play it. And it is up to 3 friends to destroy it.

programme.title: Highlander: The Series - Unholy Alliance Part 2
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 15 Duncan tracks Xavier and his mortal ally to Paris with the aid of a Federal agent.

programme.title: Highlander: The Series - The Vampire
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 16 MacLeod comes up against Nicholas Ward, an Immortal who conceals his murders by disguising them as popular hysterias.

programme.title: Highlander: The Series - Warmonger
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 17 MacLeod promised Immortal Drakov that he wouldn't fight. Today, an old man urges MacLeod to recant his promise.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone - The Monsters are Due on Maple Street
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 22 Paranoia strikes the residents of Maple Street when they believe human-looking aliens have invaded the neighborhood.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone - A World of Difference
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 23 Businessman Arthur Curtis discovers that life as he knows it doesn't really exist.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone - Long Live Walter Jameson
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 24 Walter Jameson is an excellent history teacher who talks about the past as if he had lived it.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone - People Are Alike All Over
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 25 When a space exploration crashes on Mars, the surviving passenger is surprised to find that Martians are human-looking, very friendly and apparently just like us...

programme.title: The Twilight Zone - The Execution
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 26 Just before being hanged for shooting a man in the back, a man in 1880 is transported into the year 1959 by a professor who soon realizes that he has brought forward a savage killer.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone - The Big Tall Wish
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 27 An over-the-hill boxer gets a boost from one of his biggest fans - a little boy with an unwavering belief in magic.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone - A Nice Place to Visit
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 28 After being shot to death, Rocky Valentine encounters the amiable white-haired Mr. Pip, who gives Rocky everything he wishes for.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone - Nightmare as a Child
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 29 Schoolteacher Helen Foley finds a strange and very serious little girl on the stairs outside her apartment. The little girl seems to know her and tries to jog her memory about a man she saw earlier that day. The man arrives at Helen's door…

programme.title: Farscape - Farscape: S1 E9 - DNA Mad Scientist
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 9 A scientist extracts DNA from several of Moya's crew, promising them that he would be able to use it to find the location of their home planets.

programme.title: Farscape - Farscape: S1 E10 - They've Got A Secret
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 10 During routine searches for Peacekeeper beacons, D'Argo falls down a chute, destroys a Peacekeeper shield and gets ejected into open space.

programme.title: Farscape - Farscape: S1 E11 - 'Til The Blood Runs Clear
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 11 While flying Crichton's ship near a sun with high flare activity, John and Aeryn narrowly avoid getting sucked into an unstable wormhole.

programme.title: Farscape - Farscape: S1 E12 - The Flax
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 12 Aeryn takes Crichton out in a transport pod for flying lessons but unfortunately they get stuck in the Flax, a space trap.

programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 4 A date with some expensive fails.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation (Embed) - HOME SOIL
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 117 Picard finds himself facing a strenuous test of his loyalty to Starfleet, one which the other members of the crew are struggling to cope with, whilst Wesley faces an equally challenging entrance exam at Starfleet Academy.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation (Embed) - EVOLUTION*
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 150 The Enterprise is carrying an eminent scientist, Dr. Paul Stubbs, to the site of a binary star where they are expecting a massive stellar explosion to occur in a few hours.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation (Embed) - LEGACY
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 180 The crew of the Enterprise enters into orbit around the home planet of their former crew-mate, Tasha Yar, where they encounter her sister.

programme.desc: no info available

programme.title: Star Trek: Voyager - Flesh & Blood, Part 1
programme.desc: Season 7, Episode 9 The Doctor is torn between his duty to Voyager and his conscience when warrior holograms rebel against their Hirogen creators.

programme.title: Star Trek: Voyager - Flesh & Blood, Part 2
programme.desc: Season 7, Episode 10 The Doctor questions his decision to join the rebel holograms after they kidnap B'Elanna and kill two innocent organics.

programme.title: Star Trek: Voyager - Shattered
programme.desc: Season 7, Episode 11 Voyager encounters an energy field that leaves each section – and its crew – existing in a different time period.

programme.title: Star Trek: Voyager - Lineage
programme.desc: Season 7, Episode 12 B'Elanna is strangely disturbed by her unborn child's Klingon traits.

programme.title: Star Trek: Voyager - Repentance
programme.desc: Season 7, Episode 13 The issue of capital punishment divides the crew when Voyager agrees to transport condemned prisoners to their deaths.

programme.title: Star Trek: Voyager - Prophecy
programme.desc: Season 7, Episode 14 A group of Klingons separated from the rest of their race believes B'Elanna's unborn child is the Savior foretold in their sacred scrolls.

programme.title: Star Trek: Voyager - The Void
programme.desc: Season 7, Episode 15 Voyager is sucked into an inescapable subspace void that is inhabited only by other trapped vessels battling each other for survival.

programme.title: Star Trek: Voyager - Workforce, Part 1
programme.desc: Season 7, Episode 16 The Voyager crew has been abducted and brainwashed to serve as workers in a severely short-handed industrial alien society.

programme.title: Star Trek: Voyager - Workforce, Part 2
programme.desc: Season 7, Episode 17 To save Janeway and the rest of Voyager's crew, Chakotay must convince her that her seemingly happy life as a worker on Quarra is not real.

programme.title: Star Trek: Voyager - Human Error
programme.desc: Season 7, Episode 18 Seven's attempt to explore her human side distracts her from her duties and puts Voyager at risk.

programme.title: Star Trek: Voyager - Q2
programme.desc: Season 7, Episode 19 Q's unruly and omnipotent son wreaks interstellar havoc when he is left in Janeway's care.

programme.title: Star Trek: Voyager - Author, Author
programme.desc: Season 7, Episode 20 The Doctor publishes a holo-novel based on his Voyager experiences which scandalizes the crew.

programme.title: Star Trek: Voyager - Friendship One
programme.desc: Season 7, Episode 21 Voyager recovers a long-lost space probe that has caused terrible radiation damage on a distant planet.

programme.title: Unsolved Mysteries with Robert Stack - Episode: 4
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 4 This episode includes Queen Mary Ghost Ship, Update: Carlucci, Two Strikes & UD, and Personals Pts. 1 & 2 & UD.

programme.title: Unsolved Mysteries with Robert Stack - Episode: 16
programme.desc: Season 7, Episode 16 This episode includes: Gasparetto, Tara! Tara! Tara!, Fritz and the Soldiers & UD, UD: Log Cabin Fraud and Carlos' Con & UD.

programme.title: Unsolved Mysteries with Robert Stack - Episode: 11
programme.desc: Season 12, Episode 11 This episode includes: Newlywed Found Dead, Searching for Morgan, Real Dr. Doolittle and Family Man Fugitive.

programme.title: Unsolved Mysteries with Robert Stack - Episode: 2
programme.desc: Season 6, Episode 2 This episode includes: Mystery Robber (Pts. 1 & 2) & UD, Australian UFO, Lost at Sea and Danny and His Dad.

programme.title: Unsolved Mysteries with Robert Stack - Episode: 5
programme.desc: Season 12, Episode 5 This episode includes: Boston Strangler II, Fred's Fatal Drive & UD, Red Robin Killer and UD: Deadly Doses.

programme.title: Unsolved Mysteries with Robert Stack - Episode: 15
programme.desc: Season 7, Episode 15 This episode includes: Alamo Treasure, Hospital Escape, Huey's Quest and UD: Meredith's Mother.

programme.title: Unsolved Mysteries with Robert Stack - Episode: 5
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 5 This episode includes: Baron 52 Crew, UD: Mary & Martha and Stamper's Rampage & UD

programme.title: Unsolved Mysteries with Robert Stack - Episode: 23
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 23 This episode includes: Motorcycle Mom & UD, Update: Ready Teller Robbery, White Bird, Strychnine Death and Missing Mariners.

programme.title: Unsolved Mysteries with Robert Stack - Episode: 15
programme.desc: Season 6, Episode 15 This episode includes: Resurrection Mary, UD: Who Saved My Life?, Little Girl Lost, Victor Gerena & UD and Viet Pilot's Daughter & UD.

programme.title: Unsolved Mysteries with Robert Stack - Episode: 5
programme.desc: Season 5, Episode 5 This episode includes: Dear Patricia & UD, Lucie's Last Fare & UD, Unknown Mom & UD and Little Miss Panasoffkee & UD.

programme.title: Unsolved Mysteries with Robert Stack - Episode: 6
programme.desc: Season 11, Episode 6 This episode includes: Campus Calamity, Borden House, Kerouac Fan and Kentucky Bomber & UD.

programme.title: Unsolved Mysteries with Robert Stack - Episode: 10
programme.desc: Season 10, Episode 10 This episode includes: Chair of Death, Coma Healer & UD, Animal Saviors, Holy Grail and Signs from Heaven.

programme.title: Unsolved Mysteries with Robert Stack - Episode: 6
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 6 This episode includes: Hess Pts. 1 & 2, The Wanderer and Arlington Murder & UD.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 5, Episode 20 DNA found on a marijuana joint in Florida in 2005 helps to solve the 1988 rape and murder of a California woman. And a cold case of murder in Illinois heats up when a jailhouse lawyer turns jailhouse snitch.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 9, Episode 2 The murder of an Ohio woman in 1974 is solved more than 20 years later after police get a crucial clue--the woman's husband was seen building a coffin-shaped box about the time the woman disappeared.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 17 A look at the case of James Allen Selby, a serial rapist who eluded police for years while attacking 11 women in five states - Oklahoma, Nevada, California, Arizona, and Colorado.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 10 A forensic dentist helps police nab a child killer by showing that the teeth marks on the killer's arms match the teeth of the murdered boy. And telltale blood stains on a blue bandana solve the 10-year-old case of a teenage girl murdered.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 20 A high school janitor is suspected in the murder of a young girl, but with only circumstantial evidence to go on, police must let the case go cold. And a woman asks the police to reopen the 24-year-old case of her cousin's disappearance.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 20 Police run down more than 11,000 leads before coming up with a suspect in the murders of three Virginia girls, and the abduction and strangulation of a California woman continue to baffle the investigators more than 11 years after the crime.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 23 The brutal stabbing murder of a Florida woman is solved when police find crucial DNA evidence in spit left on the pavement. And a man is put away for rape and murder when his footprint matches the footprint he left at the crime scene 18 years before.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Daddy Knows Best/Operation Jambalaya
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 5 A detective works for 15 years to nab a man who murdered and dismembered his wife to hide the sexual abuse of his children. Then, 20 years after the shooting murder of a gas station attendant, detectives get a lead.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 10 Klan leader Sam Bowers goes on trial for ordering the murder of an African-American storeowner 32 years prior, and investigators reopen the unsolved case of an African-American truck driver who was forced to leap to his death from a bridge by Klan member

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 9 When a Nevada couple demands the return of a baby they had sold to another couple, the burned body of the baby turns up in Arizona. Then, a man discovers a barrel in his crawlspace that contains the body of a woman who has been dead for decades.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 7 A woman's fall from a cliff in the Grand Canyon leads police to uncover a series of grisly murders, and investigators smoke out a killer when they find crucial DNA evidence on his cigarette butts.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 5, Episode 10 A detective vows not to shave until he solves the murder of a young Oregon woman. It takes three years and a string of Mexican Mafia informants to crack the case and allow the dedicated detective to shave his beard.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 16 A police investigator discovers a letter written 16 years earlier that provides clues to a woman's murder. And a firearms expert supplies the evidence that South Carolina authorities need to put a man on trial in 2002 for a murder committed in 1961.

programme.title: MST3K: Santo In The Treasure Of Dracula - MST3K: Santo In The Treasure Of Dracula
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 Jonah's crew watch SANTO IN THE TREASURE OF DRACULA (1969). The Mads introduce the Gizmoplex.

programme.title: MST3K: Robot Wars - MST3K: Robot Wars
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 Jonah's crew watch ROBOT WARS (1993). A new SOL is introduced and a new Gizmonic tech arrives.

programme.title: Mystery Science Theater 3000 - Eegah
programme.desc: Season 5, Episode 6 Driving home one night through the Southern California desert, teenager Roxy Miller encounters Eegah – a 7-foot giant! As Eegah’s fondness for her grows, Can Dr. Miller and Roxy’s boyfriend Tom save her from the clutches of the prehistoric caveman?

programme.title: Mystery Science Theater 3000: The Brute Man - The Brute Man
programme.desc: Season 7, Episode 2 Rondo Hatton plays a disfigured man, a/k/a “The Creeper,” who hunts down and kills the people responsible for his deformity.

programme.title: MST3K: Bloodlust - MST3K: Bloodlust
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 Mike and the Bots watch a cheap ripoff of The Most Dangerous Game, where a rich game hunter tricks a group of stranded college kids into becoming prey for his latest blood sport.

programme.title: MST3K: Earth vs. The Spider - MST3K: Earth vs. The Spider
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 Joel and the Bots get tips on public speaking from the short Speech: Using Your Voice and watch a spider devour a town in Earth vs the Spider (1958)

programme.title: MST3K: Racket Girls - Racket Girls
programme.desc: Season 6, Episode 16 A gym owner gets into trouble, becoming the target of the mob and the law. The 1950 short presents a high school couple rushing into marriage, and the marriage counselor who talks them out of it.

programme.title: MST3K: Radar Secret Service - MST3K: Radar Secret Service
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 Mike and the bots learn the art of safe driving and why you should pay attention at railroad crossings in the 1959 short, Last Clear Chance. Later, they watch government agents use radar technology to catch criminals in Radar Secret Service.

programme.title: A Painted House - A Painted House
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 10-year-old Luke had never kept a secret or told a lie. But when two groups of migrant workers-and two dangerous men-come to work the family's Arkansas cotton farm, mysteries suddenly flood Luke's world.

programme.title: In From the Night - In From the Night
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 A writer (Marcia Gay Harden) forms a compassionate bond with her nephew (Taylor Handley) after the troubled teen runs away from his parents.

programme.title: After All These Years - After All These Years
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 When a woman is wrongly accused of the death of her ex-husband, she sets out to solve the murder mystery and find the real killer before the day of the funeral, when she is to be taken into custody.

programme.title: Plainsong - Plainsong
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 Tom, a high school history teacher, is faced with raising two young sons after his wife leaves him. Maggie, a fellow teacher, tries to provide comfort and support. Gradually, they grow to need and depend on each other.

programme.title: Candles on Bay Street - Candles on Bay Street
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 Sam and Lydia have a great marriage. They're committed to each other, and to their veterinary practice. But when Sam's high school flame comes back to town, it's a time of tension for everybody.

programme.title: The Locket - The Locket
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 After his mother dies, a college dropout befriends a patient at a health-care center who gives him support and guidance. Stars Vanessa Redgrave. From the Hallmark Hall of Fame.

programme.title: Good Witch - Running Scared
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 2 Hallmark Original Series. Middleton's Heritage Festival gets everyone in town talking.

programme.title: Stargate Atlantis - Epiphany
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 12 The team discovers a device created by the Ancients that, without warning, pulls Sheppard in. As the team scrambles to release him from the strange place he is stuck in, McKay discovers that time moves differently inside.

programme.title: Stargate Atlantis - Critical Mass
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 13 The team races to foil the Goa'uld's plans to destroy Atlantis after Maj. Gen. Landry informs them that a bomb has been planted, triggered to detonate the next time the team heads to Earth. Meanwhile, two Wraith ships are heading towards Atlantis.

programme.title: Stargate Atlantis - Grace Under Pressure
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 14 While testing a newly repaired puddle jumper, McKay and Captain Hugh Griffin suddenly lose control of the ship and crash into the ocean. As the jumper begins to sink slowly towards the bottom of the ocean, Griffin sacrifices himself to save McKay.

programme.title: Stargate Universe - Common Descent
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 17 Destiny discovers the survivors of an interplanetary expedition who claim their civilization, Novus, was founded two thousand years earlier by Destiny’s crew. Suddenly, they are attacked by the Drones who have discovered a way to track Destiny.

programme.title: Stargate Universe - Epilogue
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 18 Returning the settlers to their home planet Novus, the Destiny crew discover the planet has been abandoned and is on the verge of seismic destruction. While pouring through an underground archive, the crew learns of the true origins of Novus.

programme.title: Stargate Universe - Blockade
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 19 When Destiny’s attempt to recharge in a star is foiled by attacking drones, Eli suggests a risky plan to recharge in a super-hot blue giant…a star so hot it could destroy the ship…unless someone stays aboard and keeps the ship under manual control.

programme.title: Stargate Universe - Gauntlet
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 20 After a battle, Destiny’s only option for survival is a jump to the next galaxy. Crew members return to Earth to say what may be their final farewells before embarking on their journey. But a risky stop may put the entire plan in jeopardy.

programme.title: Stargate SG-1 - Full Circle
programme.desc: Season 6, Episode 22 Daniel appears to O'Neill and alerts him that Anubis has located the Eye of Ra, an object of power hidden on Abydos. With Daniel's help, SG-1 find the Eye first. Determined to have it, Anubis threatens to destroy the planet unless they hand it over.

programme.title: Stargate SG-1 - Fallen
programme.desc: Season 7, Episode 1 As SG-1 begins its search for the Lost City, they discover that Jackson has been returned by the Ancients without any memory of who he was. While SG-1 tries to help him regain his memory, they discover that the Lost City is not on the same planet.

programme.title: Stargate SG-1 - Homecoming
programme.desc: Season 7, Episode 2 Anubis travels to Kelowna after discovering that it has mines of a more powerful source of energy that he can use to make his new weapon more destructive. The leaders of Kelowna contact SG-1 for their help, but make an ill-advised deal with Anubis.

programme.title: Stargate SG-1 - Fragile Balance
programme.desc: Season 7, Episode 3 A 15-year-old infiltrates the SGC with the startling news that he is Colonel Jack O'Neill, having mysteriously reverse aged 30 years overnight. Possessing O'Neill's knowledge, exact DNA and, above all, his attitude, can he really be O'Neill?

programme.title: Stargate SG-1 - Orpheus
programme.desc: Season 7, Episode 4 Through the help of Daniel, Teal'c visualizes that Rya'c and Bra'tac are being held prisoner in a Goa'uld death camp. With SG-1's help, Teal'c sets out to rescue his son and his mentor, but can he overcome his fears in time?

programme.title: Stargate SG-1 - Revisions
programme.desc: Season 7, Episode 5 Six thousand light-years away, O'Neill and the SG-1 team discover a devastated universe where the inhabitants must live in a protective dome. They survive through an all-controlling computer system called the Link. But is it a savior, or a curse?
